Vue.name: vuex
Vue.purpose: State management pattern + library for Vue.js applications
Vue.usage: Manages state in large Vue applications, providing a centralized store for all components

Vue.name: vue-router
Vue.usage: Handles navigation in Vue applications, allowing for dynamic routing and views

Vue.name: vuetify
Vue.usage: Provides a wide range of customizable UI components following Material Design guidelines

Vue.name: nuxt.js
Vue.purpose: Intuitive Vue framework for building server-side rendered applications
Vue.usage: Simplifies the process of building universal or static-generated Vue.js applications

Vue.name: vue-cli
Vue.usage: Offers a quick setup for new Vue projects with various configurations and build tools

Vue.name: vue-test-utils
Vue.purpose: Official unit testing utility library for Vue.js
Vue.usage: Facilitates writing unit tests for Vue components in an easy and accessible manner

Vue.name: vue-i18n
Vue.usage: Enables easy integration of multi-language support into Vue applications

Vue.name: vee-validate
Vue.usage: Helps in managing form validation rules and messages in Vue applications

Vue.name: vue-axios
Vue.purpose: Small wrapper for integrating axios to Vuejs
Vue.usage: Facilitates making HTTP requests from Vue applications using the Axios library

Vue.name: quasar
Vue.purpose: High-performance Material Design component suite for Vue.js
Vue.usage: Offers responsive and customizable components for building Vue apps with Material Design

Vue.name: vuepress
Vue.usage: Ideal for creating static websites and documentation with Vue components

Next.js.name: @next/bundle-analyzer
Next.js.purpose: Analyzes and visualizes the size of webpack output files
Next.js.usage: Helps in optimizing and understanding the bundle size of a Next.js application

Next.js.name: next-seo
Next.js.purpose: Simplifies managing SEO (Search Engine Optimization) in Next.js applications
Next.js.usage: Provides a set of SEO components for managing metadata and social media tags

Next.js.name: next-auth
Next.js.purpose: Adds authentication support to Next.js applications
Next.js.usage: Simplifies the implementation of authentication with various providers

Next.js.name: next-i18next
Next.js.purpose: Provides internationalization (i18n) support in Next.js applications
Next.js.usage: Makes it easy to translate and switch between different languages

Next.js.name: styled-components
Next.js.purpose: Allows writing actual CSS code to style React components
Next.js.usage: Helps in building small, reusable, and maintainable CSS for React components

Next.js.name: tailwindcss
Next.js.purpose: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs
Next.js.usage: Provides low-level utility classes to build custom designs without writing CSS

Next.js.name: @emotion/react
Next.js.purpose: Library for writing CSS styles with JavaScript
Next.js.usage: Allows the styling of components in a way that leverages the power of JavaScript

Next.js.name: @emotion/styled
Next.js.purpose: A styled API for @emotion/react for defining component styles
Next.js.usage: Used for creating React components that have styles attached to them

Next.js.name: eslint-plugin-next
Next.js.purpose: Provides ESLint rules for Next.js projects
Next.js.usage: Helps in identifying and reporting on patterns in Next.js applications

Next.js.name: next-pwa
Next.js.purpose: Integrates PWA (Progressive Web App) support in Next.js applications
Next.js.usage: Simplifies the process of making a Next.js app work offline and load faster

Next.js.name: redux
Next.js.purpose: A predictable state container for JavaScript applications
Next.js.usage: Helps in managing the state of an application in a consistent and centralized manner

Next.js.name: react-redux
Next.js.purpose: Official React bindings for Redux
Next.js.usage: Lets you use Redux with React effectively by connecting components to the Redux store

Next.js.name: next-sitemap
Next.js.purpose: Generates a sitemap for Next.js applications
Next.js.usage: Automates the creation of a sitemap, improving SEO and site indexing

Next.js.name: apollo-client
Next.js.purpose: A comprehensive state management library for JavaScript that enables you to manage both local and remote data with GraphQL
Next.js.usage: Used to fetch, cache, and modify application data, all while automatically updating UI

Next.js.name: axios
Next.js.purpose: A promise-based HTTP client for making HTTP requests from node.js or XMLHttpRequests from the browser
Next.js.usage: Commonly used to perform CRUD operations and interact with APIs

Next.js.name: next-transpile-modules
Next.js.purpose: Transpile modules from `node_modules` in Next.js applications
Next.js.usage: Helps in including and using ES6 modules within a Next.js app

Next.js.name: next-compose-plugins
Next.js.purpose: Provides a cleaner way to organize Next.js plugins in your `next.config.js`
Next.js.usage: Simplifies the configuration of multiple plugins in Next.js

Next.js.name: next-images
Next.js.purpose: Import images in Next.js (e.g., jpg, jpeg, svg, png, gif)
Next.js.usage: Allows the use of images just like JavaScript modules

Next.js.name: next-mdx-remote
Next.js.purpose: Loads and renders MDX (Markdown for JSX) content from remote sources in Next.js
Next.js.usage: Enables the use of MDX content from external sources, such as a CMS

Next.js.name: dotenv
Next.js.purpose: Loads environment variables from a `.env` file into `process.env`
Next.js.usage: Provides a simple way to manage configuration settings and secrets in development and production

Next.js.name: next-redux-wrapper
Next.js.purpose: Integrates Redux with Next.js
Next.js.usage: Makes it easier to use Redux within a Next.js application, especially for server-rendered pages

Next.js.name: swr
Next.js.purpose: A React Hooks library for data fetching
Next.js.usage: Provides a way to fetch data in React components with built-in caching, revalidation, and error handling features

svelte.name: svelte/store
svelte.purpose: Provides state management within Svelte applications
svelte.usage: Allows the creation of writable, readable, and derived stores for managing reactive state

svelte.name: svelte-spa-router
svelte.purpose: Router for Single Page Applications (SPA) in Svelte
svelte.usage: Enables navigation between different components/pages in a Svelte SPA

svelte.name: svelte-preprocess
svelte.purpose: Allows using TypeScript, SCSS, and other languages within Svelte components
svelte.usage: Provides a seamless integration of different languages and tools into Svelte components

svelte.name: svelte-loader
svelte.purpose: Webpack loader for compiling Svelte components
svelte.usage: Enables Webpack to process Svelte components and integrate them into a Webpack build pipeline

svelte.name: svelte-routing
svelte.purpose: Provides a declarative way to define routes in Svelte applications
svelte.usage: Used for creating and managing routes in Svelte apps, integrating with the Svelte reactivity system

svelte.name: svelte-material-ui
svelte.purpose: Svelte adaptation of Google's Material Design Components
svelte.usage: Offers a wide range of ready-to-use UI components following Material Design principles for Svelte

svelte.name: svelte-transition
svelte.purpose: Provides transition effects for Svelte components
svelte.usage: Enables adding animations during the addition or removal of Svelte components in the DOM

svelte.name: svelte-action
svelte.purpose: Contains actions for enhancing DOM elements in Svelte
svelte.usage: Allows attaching extra functionality or behavior to DOM elements in Svelte components

svelte.name: svelte-select
svelte.purpose: A select component for Svelte applications
svelte.usage: Provides a customizable and reactive select dropdown component for Svelte apps

svelte.name: svelte-i18n
svelte.usage: Facilitates building multi-language Svelte applications with dynamic language switching

svelte.name: svelte-headlessui
svelte.purpose: Unstyled, fully accessible UI components for Svelte
svelte.usage: Provides a set of unstyled, accessible components for building custom UIs with Svelte
